name: Eiscue
description: It drifted in on the flow of ocean waters from a frigid place. It keeps its head iced constantly to make sure it stays nice and cold.

abilities.name: Ice Face
abilities.effect: If this Pokémon has full HP, it takes 60 less damage from your opponent’s attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Blizzard
attacks.effect: This attack also does 10 damage to each of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
